testcase.classname: US_003 Registration page should restrict password usage to a secure
testcase.name: TC_001 There should be at least one lowercase char for stronger password and
testcase.system-out: When User goes to "GmiBank_url" Homepage....................................passed And User clicks the "Register" from dropdown menu...........................passed And User scrolls down the page..............................................passed And User enters to password text a password "invalid_password1" that contains six character, at leats an uppercase a digit aspecial character.passed And user sees not last green bar............................................passed And user enters a lowercase "lowerCase" character...........................passed Then user sees last green bar...............................................passed
